Package ohos.interwork.ui

Class RemoteViewEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.interwork.ui.RemoteViewEx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParcelableEx

    public class RemoteViewEx
extends Object
implements ParcelableEx
    Converts a HarmonyOS layout into one that can be identified by other systems and writes the converted layout into a Parcel object.
    Since:
    3
